title: Cities of Gold: A Journey Across the American Southwest in Pursuit of Coronado
description: This new ebook edition of Cities of Gold includes for very first time over 100 never-before-published photographs taken during the authorâ€™s epic, thousand mile horseback journey across Arizona and New Mexico. It also includes many rare and extraordinary historical photographs of the Old West, Native Americans, pioneers, prospectors, Indian pueblos, and vanished landscapes.
author: Douglas Preston
